translation.en: The Dark Army approaches, my lord. But there is still time for us to escape.
translation.fr: L'armée des ténèbres approche. Mais il est encore temps de s'échapper.

translation.en: Why do you think he did it?
I offered him land to last his families a lifetime over.
translation.fr: Je lui ai proposé des terres pour toute sa famille.

translation.en: How could one be so stupid?
Mitsuhide's prejudice grew beyond repair.
translation.fr: Mitsuhide n'allait plus revenir de notre côté.

translation.en: Hojo Daimyo warped his mind
and fed his anger with power and corruption.
translation.fr: et a nourri sa colère de pouvoir et de corruption.

translation.en: [lord] I was referring to me.
[grunts] And look at you, Yasuke.
From servant to samurai.
The only one who didn't betray me.
translation.fr: Le seul qui ne m'a jamais trahi.

translation.en: -[metallic clink] -We should drink to that.
We do not have time for this.
The Daimyo is going to bring hell through those doors.
translation.fr: L'armée de la daimyō est à nos portes.

translation.en: Let them come.
They are the guest of honor to our little party.
translation.fr: Ce sont les invités d'honneur de notre petite fête.

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Yasuke, take it.
Drink with me. Celebrate this moment.
translation.fr: Bois avec moi. Ce moment se fête.

translation.en: [raising voice] What is there to celebrate, my lord?
Your forces are scattered. Your dream of a unified Japan is gone.
translation.fr: Vos forces sont dispersées. Votre rêve d'un Japon uni est fini.

translation.en: -The temple walls burn as we speak-- -I am still your lord.
translation.fr: - Le temple brûle… - Je suis encore ton seigneur.

translation.en: If I die here, perhaps Mitsuhide will let Ranmaru live.
translation.fr: Si je meurs ici, peut-être que Mitsuhide laissera la vie à Ranmaru.

translation.en: Are you sure he made it out in time?
translation.fr: Tu es sûr qu'il est en sécurité ?

translation.en: He was smuggled out on the last ship, just as you requested.
translation.fr: On l'a fait passer par bateau, comme vous l'avez ordonné.

translation.en: -Was he afraid? -No, he was strong.
translation.fr: - A-t-il eu peur ? - Non, il a été fort.

translation.en: Good.
Now, all that is left for me is an honorable death.
translation.fr: Il ne me reste plus qu'à me donner une mort honorable.

translation.en: My lord, if we barricade the side entrance
translation.fr: Monseigneur, si on barricade les côtés

translation.en: and force them to enter through the halls, we can bottleneck their forces and then cut them down in waves.
translation.fr: et qu'on les force à entrer par devant, nous pouvons les massacrer dans le goulet.

translation.en: I appoint you, Yasuke, as kaishakunin.
This is my final command of you, my friend.
translation.fr: C'est mon ultime ordre, cher ami.

translation.en: What? I don't understand. We could still fight back.
translation.fr: Je ne comprends pas. Nous pouvons encore nous défendre.

translation.en: [lord] This is the only way to save Ranmaru.
translation.fr: C'est le seul moyen de sauver Ranmaru.

translation.en: No, there is no honor in this.
[Nobunaga] Thank you, Yasuke.
[gasping] What are you waiting for?
[yells in Japanese] Do it! Do it!
Over here!
Yassan! Over here!
[all] Thanks!
I almost landed my attack this time.
translation.fr: J'ai failli te toucher, cette fois.

translation.en: Stop bothering me.
I don't care.
Ichiro, I told you, no training in my bar.
translation.fr: Ichiro, pas d'entraînement dans mon bar.

translation.en: You're scaring away the customers.
[Ichiro] How do you grow your hair like that?
translation.fr: Comment tu as de tels cheveux ?

translation.en: Where do you come from? How did you get here?
Who taught you how to fight? Can they teach me? Can you teach me?
translation.fr: Qui t'a enseigné le combat ? Tu peux m'apprendre ?

translation.en: I wanna fight in battles like the great samurai warriors before me.
translation.fr: Je veux me battre comme les grands guerriers samouraïs.

translation.en: I will succeed where they failed and defeat the Daimyo.
translation.fr: Je réussirai là où ils ont échoué et je vaincrai la daimyō.

translation.en: A true warrior, above all else, prays for peace. Not war.
translation.fr: Un vrai guerrier prie pour la paix par-dessus tout. Pas pour la guerre.

translation.en: [Ichiro] War brings peace.
translation.fr: La guerre mène à la paix.

translation.en: Peace brings freedom.
translation.fr: La paix mène à la liberté.

translation.en: I will save the land from the evil Daimyo.
translation.fr: Je nous sauverai de la cruelle daimyō.

translation.en: Who am I?
I'm the greatest warrior in all the land.
translation.fr: Le plus grand guerrier du pays.

translation.en: -Huah! [gasps] -[man] Shut up. Stay right there!
Who goes there?
[woman] Practicing your swordplay again?
[Ichiro] Practice? I'm a master.
Master? Of what?
Hey, Ichiro. Fight any bad guys today?
translation.fr: Salut, Ichiro. Tu as combattu des méchants ?

translation.en: Yep. Two soldiers outside the village. Had them running scared.
translation.fr: Oui, j'ai fait fuir deux soldats près du village.

translation.en: -[sighs] Those soldiers are dangerous. -I'm dangerous too.
translation.fr: Ils sont dangereux. Et moi aussi.

translation.en: -[chuckles] It's that samurai kid. -I'm not a kid!
translation.fr: - Le petit samouraï. - Je ne suis pas petit !

translation.en: Yes, you are!
Can anyone help?
Whatever you can spare.
Mercy.
Thank you!
[boy] Ichiro!
Get him!
Hey! Come back here. Damn it!
Take off that silly mask.
A samurai never shows his face.
translation.fr: Un samouraï ne montre jamais son visage.

translation.en: [girl] Ichiro, I've already seen your face.
translation.fr: Ichiro, j'ai déjà vu ton visage.

translation.en: So, Mr. Samurai, did you finally land an attack on Yassan?
translation.fr: Alors, monsieur le samouraï, tu as enfin réussi à toucher Yassan ?

translation.en: No, but I came really close this time.
I approached from his blind side, but he felt me coming. I'll be better next time. [grunts]
translation.fr: Il a senti mon approche discrète. Je ferai mieux la prochaine fois.

translation.en: [chuckling] I know you will.
Here, you try.
[grunts softly] I don't know.
It's okay. You'll get your strength back soon enough.
translation.fr: Ça va aller. Tu retrouveras bientôt tes forces.

translation.en: [gasps] My bokken.
Yassan gave me this.
I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know what happened.
Saki, are you all right?
I'm okay, Mother.
You're on fire.
Here, take this.
What happened?
Saki was holding it, and it just split in two. How will I train?
translation.fr: Saki le tenait et il s'est brisé en deux. Comment je vais m'entraîner ?

translation.en: [Saki] What's wrong, Mother?
I think it's time I take you to see the doctor.
translation.fr: Il est temps que tu voies le docteur.

translation.en: But you always said the doctor was a great journey away.
translation.fr: Tu as toujours dit qu'il était très loin d'ici.

translation.en: I like it here with my friends.
translation.fr: J'aime être ici avec mes amis.

translation.en: There will be no discussion on this.
-How long is the journey? -[sighs]
A week on foot.
Yassan could get you there in a day or two.
translation.fr: Yassan vous y mènerait en deux jours.

translation.en: The Black boatsman?
Yes. He will be your guide, and I will be your protection.
translation.fr: Oui. Il vous guidera et je vous protégerai.

translation.en: A child who thinks he's a samurai.
translation.fr: Un enfant qui se croit samouraï.

translation.en: I will be one, one day.
translation.fr: Un jour, j'en serai vraiment un.

translation.en: Vodka.
What's that?
I'm looking for someone.
A woman with child. A little girl.
translation.fr: Une femme avec un enfant. Une petite fille.

translation.en: Well, there's plenty of women and children here.
translation.fr: Il y a plein de femmes et d'enfants ici.

translation.en: Yeah, sometimes they piss themselves whenever they get too drunk.
translation.fr: Parfois, ils se pissent dessus quand ils ont trop bu.

translation.en: Wait, no drink?
Come with me. We have some fun.
Me?
Me?
I guess that's a vodka.
translation.fr: Ça doit être ça, une vodka.

translation.en: [lord] What are you waiting for?
[yells in Japanese] Do it!
An empty bottle. I've failed you.
[man] Black boatsman!
What do you have for us today?
-[man 2] Lunch. -[man 1 chuckling] Oh…
Next time, Black boatsman. Next time.
How did I do, Yassan?
Hmm. You would have done better with your bokken.
I'm sorry. It split in two.
translation.fr: Désolé. Il s'est brisé en deux.

translation.en: I made that myself. You're not strong enough to split it in two.
translation.fr: Je l'ai fabriqué moi-même. Tu n'es pas assez fort pour le briser.

translation.en: -I didn't break it! -[Saki's mother] Black boatsman.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas moi ! Batelier noir.

translation.en: This little one here says you can help my daughter.
translation.fr: Le petit dit que vous pouvez aider ma fille.

translation.en: My name is Ichika.
I sing here sometimes.
Yes, I know who you are.
translation.fr: Oui, je sais qui vous êtes.

translation.en: You have a… [hesitates] …lovely voice.
translation.fr: Vous avez une très belle voix.

translation.en: Thank you.
-[Yasuke] You have a daughter? -Yes.
That's who broke my bokken.
My daughter has grown very ill.
We must travel upstream a few days' journey for her to be cared for.
translation.fr: On doit remonter la rivière pour qu'elle se fasse soigner.

translation.en: The village here has a doctor who can provide care.
translation.fr: Il y a un médecin dans ce village. Pas besoin de voyager.

translation.en: -There's no need to travel upstream. -This is a special doctor.
translation.fr: Il y a un médecin dans ce village. Pas besoin de voyager. Il lui faut un docteur spécifique. Si nous restons, elle mourra.

translation.en: If we don't go, she will die.
translation.fr: Il lui faut un docteur spécifique. Si nous restons, elle mourra.

translation.en: [Yasuke] She will die if we go.
No one returns from the north. The journey would be suicide.
translation.fr: Personne ne revient du nord. Ce serait suicidaire.

translation.en: The warring territory is too dangerous.
The risk of the journey is worth saving her life.
translation.fr: Le risque en vaut la chandelle.

translation.en: Just take her to the village doctor.
translation.fr: Emmenez-la voir le médecin du village.

translation.en: You have no honor!
You have no idea what honor is, boy. Honor is not willingly giving up your life.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais rien de l'honneur, petit. Abandonner sa vie, ce n'est pas honorable.

translation.en: Please, Yassan, save her.
I said it's too dangerous.
[man] You will love what we brought. These items come from far and wide.
translation.fr: Vous allez adorer, ce sont des trésors du monde entier.

translation.en: You will be the only man on this side of the world to claim such treasures.
translation.fr: Vous serez le seul homme du pays à posséder tels trésors.

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Ranmaru.
What do you think?
I think it is beautiful, my lord.
I'll take it. Show me more.
What did you say, boy? You tell me I have no honor?
translation.fr: Que me dis-tu, petit ? Que je n'ai pas d'honneur ?

translation.en: You will pay for your insolence.
translation.fr: Tu vas payer pour ton insolence !

translation.en: [Yasuke, in Japanese] Wait!
[in English] What honor is there in striking down a child?
What's going on here?
I shall stop this at once.
Wait. This could be interesting.
Of course.
You dare speak to me? You allow your servant to speak?
translation.fr: Tu oses m'adresser la parole ? Vous l'autorisez à parler ?

translation.en: I apologize for his slippery tongue.
translation.fr: Je m'excuse pour son manque de manières.

translation.en: He should know his place, shut his mouth.
translation.fr: Qu'il reste à sa place et qu'il la ferme.

translation.en: -[people gasp] -[Yasuke] Leave the boy alone.
Guess I'll have to shut your mouth for you.
translation.fr: Je vais devoir te forcer à te taire.

translation.en: -[bystander] Get back, get back! -[crowd murmurs]
[merchant, nervously] I am so sorry, Lord Nobunaga. He will not go unpunished.
translation.fr: Je suis navré, seigneur Nobunaga. Il sera dûment puni.

translation.en: No need. He fought well.
A man deserves to be clean. Wash him.
Why is he not clean?
It is not dirt. It is the color of his skin, my lord.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas de la saleté. C'est sa couleur de peau, seigneur.

translation.en: Did you ink your skin black?
No, I was born with black skin.
translation.fr: Non, je suis né avec la peau noire.

translation.en: You were born with black skin?
[Yasuke] Yes.
Interesting. What is your name?
Eu-- I--
[chuckling nervously] I-- I apologize for his rudeness.
The Yao people have a… [hesitates] …strong cultural identity.
translation.fr: Le peuple Yao a une forte identité culturelle.

translation.en: Hmm. Yao. How about Yasuke?
translation.fr: Les Yao. Et si on l'appelait Yasuke ?

translation.en: I like him.
I'll take him too.
[Ichika] Make sure you have everything. If we leave now, we can avoid the patrols.
translation.fr: N'oublie rien, surtout. À cette heure, il y a moins de patrouilles.

translation.en: [hushed] Mother. Someone is here.
You're right to leave now.
translation.fr: C'est une bonne heure pour partir. Il y a moins de patrouilles.

translation.en: Patrols are light at this time. It's wise to gain ground before dawn.
translation.fr: C'est une bonne heure pour partir. Il y a moins de patrouilles. C'est sage de prendre de l'avance.

translation.en: Is Yassan taking us, Mother?
Yes. He is.
Beautiful land and home. Lord Nobunaga shows favor.
translation.fr: Un beau terrain, et une belle demeure. Une faveur du seigneur Nobunaga.

translation.en: Impressive, especially for an outsider such as yourself.
translation.fr: Impressionnant, surtout pour un étranger comme vous.

translation.en: -You were there that day. -Indeed. You saved my little brother here.
translation.fr: Vous étiez là. Oui. Vous avez sauvé mon petit frère.

translation.en: For that, you have my gratitude.
Where I'm from, it's everyone's duty to protect the children of the land.
translation.fr: Protéger les enfants, c'est la responsabilité de tous.

translation.en: -You're a samurai, yes? -Onna Bugeisha.
[Yasuke] Is it common in this country for a woman to gain such a high military rank?
translation.fr: Est-il commun dans ce pays qu'une femme atteigne un tel rang militaire ?

translation.en: [woman] No. No, it is not.
[Yasuke] Impressive.
[woman] Nobunaga awards those who have proven themselves.
translation.fr: Nobunaga récompense ceux qui ont fait leurs preuves.

translation.en: As you can attest.
You could have defended your brother yourself. Why didn't you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi n'avez-vous pas défendu votre frère vous-même ?

translation.en: The code of the samurai forbids me to interfere when honor is challenged.
translation.fr: Le code du samouraï me défend d'intervenir quand l'honneur est remis en question.

translation.en: My brother made a grave mistake.
translation.fr: Mon frère a fait une grave erreur.

translation.en: What you did was honorable in its own right.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez agi de façon honorable.

translation.en: You have my respect.
And whose respect do I have?
translation.fr: Le respect de qui, au juste ?

translation.en: I am Natsumaru.
And what do they call you, the samurai that was once a servant?
translation.fr: Comment vous appelle-t-on, serviteur devenu samouraï ?

translation.en: [Ichika] You snore.
Hm-- What's her name?
Saki. She's gotten worse in the past few weeks.
translation.fr: Saki. Son état a empiré ces dernières semaines.

translation.en: Does she always sweat like this?
The sweating is new.
You should get more rest.
The boy wants to be a great warrior. He looks up to you.
translation.fr: Le garçon veut être un grand guerrier. Il vous admire.

translation.en: Why? Who are you?
I'm just a boatsman.
Nothing special about me. He's just impatient to become a man.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien de spécial. Il a simplement hâte de devenir un homme.

translation.en: Well, I've seen the way you move to avoid his attacks.
translation.fr: J'ai vu votre façon d'esquiver ses attaques.

translation.en: I hear the things you say,
the way you yell out in your sleep, like a man haunted by his past.
translation.fr: Vos cris nocturnes sont ceux d'un homme hanté par son passé.

translation.en: The necklace you wear.
That symbol is familiar. I-I've seen it before.
translation.fr: Ce symbole m'est familier. Je l'ai déjà vu.

translation.en: -[Ichika] Why are you doing this? -Doing what?
Helping us. Why did you change your mind?
translation.fr: Pourquoi avez-vous décidé de nous aider ?

translation.en: [Yasuke] One village. [Ichika] And what does that mean?
translation.fr: - Il faut tout un village. - Que voulez-vous dire ?

translation.en: [Yasuke] Where I'm from, every man and woman cares for every child.
translation.fr: D'où je viens, tout le monde s'occupe de tous les enfants.

translation.en: It is our duty to make sure every child is safe.
translation.fr: C'est notre devoir de les garder en sécurité.

translation.en: -[Saki coughing] -[Ichika] It's okay.
[Yasuke] I've seen many illnesses but nothing like this.
translation.fr: J'ai vu beaucoup de maladies, mais rien de tel.

translation.en: She's a special child.
She requires special care. That is all you need to know.
translation.fr: Il lui faut des soins particuliers.

translation.en: Why are you stopping? I am not stopping.
[robot] He's Black.
We can see that.
[robot] I thought you were the only Black man in Japan.
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu étais le seul noir au Japon.

translation.en: [chuckles] Apparently not.
[robot] Are you two related? [man] Shut up, scrap metal.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes parents ? - La ferme, tas de ferraille.

translation.en: [woman] He's kinda cute for an old man.
translation.fr: Il est mignon pour un vieil homme.

translation.en: [robot] Your attraction to him is illogical.
translation.fr: Ton attirance pour lui est illogique.

translation.en: The child, Chernyy.
Why are you here for this child?
So be it, Chernyy.
So be it, indeed.
[in Japanese] No honor to be had here. Only pain and blood.
translation.fr: Il n'y aura pas d'honneur. Seulement le sang et la douleur.

translation.en: -[in English] What was that? -He just spoke Japanese.
translation.fr: Il dit quoi ? Il a parlé japonais.

translation.en: The Black man spoke Japanese?
Yes. I spoke Japanese.
You speak Japanese and recite ancient proverbs.
translation.fr: Vous parlez japonais et récitez d'anciens proverbes.

translation.en: You must have lived a good life.
translation.fr: Vous avez dû vivre une belle vie.

translation.en: -Mother! -[groaning]
[yells] Leave us alone!
